text: I believe in America with health care for all, where teachers are paid their value, where being Black in your own home isn’t a death sentence. Together, we can make that America a reality.
My brother Tommy was the finest public servant I have ever known. All his life, Tommy worked on the side of the angels. Now, he is with them. https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/102019

You have to inspire people.

My Children’s Agenda will:

✅Ensure our children have access to health care and high-quality education
✅Stop the treatment of children as adults in the criminal justice system
✅Cut child poverty by at least 50% in my first term

A lot of people think that folks like your typical lawyer or doctor are in “the 1%.”

That may be bc it’s hard to conceive how bad runaway inequality has gotten.
